description: Each completed project reflects <1>deep technical expertise</1> and an <2>understanding of specific client needs</2>. From <3>modern web applications</3> to <4>robust microservice architectures</4>, through <5>customized solutions</5>, each achievement demonstrates a commitment to delivering high-performance and sustainable results. Discover a selection of projects that showcase the ability to transform ideas into concrete and innovative solutions.
forClient: This project has been realized for the client <1>{{client}}</1>.

project1.title: Eurotunnel Freight Tracking
project1.description:
On this project, innovative microservices were developed to expand the tracking capabilities of freight trucks crossing the English Channel.
 In parallel, technical modernization of essential components related to vehicle tracking was undertaken.
 Additionally, the back-office managing the application used by drivers was upgraded with new features to enhance their overall experience.

project2.title: Cdiscount à Volonté
project2.description:
On this project, the development of the 'Cdiscount à volonté' offer was a priority. This involved creating microservices in Java with Spring and enhancing the offer on the PC website using .NET and C#.
 Additionally, improvements were made to the offer on mobile platforms and applications using React JS and React Native, ensuring an optimal user experience.

project3.title: Detection of NSFW images
project3.description: Development of a service to detect NSFW (Not Safe For Work) images based on AI for an upload system.

ees.title: EES (Entry-Exit system)
ees.description:
The Entry/Exit System (EES) will be an automated IT system designed to register travelers from third countries. It is a project introduced by the European Commission.
My role on this project was to design and implement the overall architecture of the solution (around ten microservices, two frontends, across five application domains).

boardingpax.title: Boarding Pax
boardingpax.description: Real-time provision of loading plans for cross-Channel vehicle transport wagons, to enable staff to validate vehicle placement. This loading plan also facilitates intervention in the event of an incident.

rancher.title: Rancher Cluster
rancher.description: The goal of this project was to create a Kubernetes cluster using the Rancher software. The cluster was then used to deploy microservices and applications. The all platform is monitored using Open telemetry standard and OpenObserve (OTLP).

3ie-report.title: Expertise Report
3ie-report.description:
Implementation of a web application to generate expertise reports by aggregating data from multiple sources.
 Use of the French cadastre, AI, and other APIs to complete and generate the Word document.
